title: Penalties
context: §605-17 Penalties. Any person violating sections 605-14 to 605-16 shall be guilty of a misdemeanor. [L 1955, c 150, §2; RL 1955, §217-15; HRS §605-17; am L 1972, c 184, §1(i); am L 1975, c 45, pt of §2; am L 2001, c 47, §2] Case Notes Penalty for first offense is only a violation. 68 H. 226, 708 P.2d 138 (1985). Where Oregon law firm did not &ldquo;practice law within the jurisdiction&rdquo; of Hawaii, it did not violate §605-14 nor this section; thus, plaintiff could recover fees under §607-14 for services rendered by firm. 87 H. 37, 951 P.2d 487 (1998).
